channel.title: CVE Feed for Hidden Depth -- Sticky banner

item.title: CVE-2024-35170|2024-05-13T10:00:31.308Z -- Hidden Depth -- Sticky banner
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hidden Depth Sticky banner allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sticky banner: from n/a through 1.2.0.
